title: User Registration and JWT Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can register with a valid email and password and receive a valid JWT token upon successful login.

steps.description: Open the registration page.
Input a valid email and password with proper format.
Submit the registration form.
Registration succeeds, and the user receives confirmation.
Navigate to the login page.
Enter the registered email and password.
Submit the login form.
User is logged in, JWT token is issued, and stored securely in client.

title: User Registration with Weak Password Rejection
description: Ensure the registration system rejects weak passwords and displays appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Open the registration page.
Input a valid email and a password that is too short or common.
Submit the registration form.
Registration fails with clear feedback about password requirements.

title: JWT Authentication with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login attempts with invalid credentials are rejected and do not issue JWT tokens.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter an unregistered email or wrong password.
Submit login.
Login fails with proper error message, and no JWT token is issued.

title: Room Creation Without Password
description: Confirm users can successfully create a room using a 4-character alphanumeric code without setting a password.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the room creation interface.
Create a room without entering any password.
Room is created successfully with a valid 4-character code displayed.
Room shows real-time user count starting at 1.

title: Room Creation With Password and Unauthorized Access Prevention
description: Verify that a room created with a password requires that password for other users to join and refuses access if incorrect password is provided.

steps.description: Create a new room with a password set.
Log out or open the app in a new session.
Attempt to join the room with an incorrect password.
Access is denied with an appropriate error message.
Attempt to join the room again with the correct password.
Access is granted and user enters the room successfully.

title: Join Room via 4-Character Code and QR Code
description: Validate that a user can join existing rooms either by entering the 4-character code manually or scanning a QR code.

steps.description: Obtain a valid 4-character room code.
Enter the code manually into the join room field.
User successfully joins the room without errors.
Obtain the QR code associated with a different room.
Use the in-app QR code scanner to scan the code.
User successfully joins the room linked to the scanned QR code.

title: Real-time Clipboard Text Sharing
description: Ensure text clipboard data shared in a room is synchronized in real-time to all participants with correct updates.

steps.description: User A enters a room and sends text content to the clipboard.
User B joins the same room.
User B sees the clipboard text updated in real-time immediately upon sharing.
User B updates the clipboard text.
User A receives the updated clipboard text instantly.

title: Real-time File Sharing with Drag-and-Drop Upload
description: Verify that files can be uploaded via drag-and-drop within a room, with progress tracking and type validation working correctly.

steps.description: User opens a room.
Drag and drop a supported file type onto the file upload area.
File upload progress is shown and advances correctly.
File is fully uploaded and synchronized to all room participants.
Attempt to upload an unsupported file type.
Upload is rejected with an error message indicating invalid file type.

title: Clipboard Data Expiration After 15 Minutes
description: Test that clipboard text and file data shared within a room expire automatically after 15 minutes and are removed from all clients.

steps.description: User shares clipboard text or file data in a room.
Shared data is visible to all room participants immediately.
Wait for 15 minutes (simulate time if possible).
Shared clipboard data and files are deleted automatically and no longer visible to users.

title: Room Auto-Deletion and Data Clearance on Leave
description: Validate that when a user leaves a room, the room data is deleted if empty and shared clipboard content is cleared per privacy rules.

steps.description: User enters a room and clipboard data is shared.
User leaves the room.
If no other users remain, room and data are deleted.
Another user joins the room afterward.
Room does not exist or is empty, requiring recreation.

title: Dark/Light Theme Toggle and Persistence
description: Check that the user can toggle between dark and light themes, the UI updates accordingly, and user preference is saved and reapplied on reload.

steps.description: Load the application on a device with default system preference.
Initial theme matches system preference automatically.
Toggle the theme switch to change theme manually.
Theme changes immediately across all UI components.
Reload the application.
The manually selected theme preference is persisted and applied.

title: Mobile-First Responsive UI and Touch Optimization
description: Verify that the application UI adapts correctly across mobile, tablet, and desktop resolutions and interfaces with touch-friendly elements on mobile.

steps.description: Open the app on a desktop screen.
Layout uses suitable components for large screens, supports keyboard navigation.
Open the app on a mobile device or emulator.
Layout is touch friendly, with appropriately sized buttons and inputs.
Rotate the device to landscape and back to portrait.
UI adjusts responsively without broken components or unusable controls.

title: Client-side Clipboard Content Encryption Verification
description: Ensure clipboard content is encrypted on the client side before transmission and decrypted correctly by authorized clients only.

steps.description: User shares clipboard text or file in a room.
Verify the data sent over WebSocket is encrypted and not in plain text.
Other clients in the room can decrypt and see the original content correctly.
Clients outside of the room or unauthorized users cannot access or decrypt the content.

title: Room User Count Real-time Update
description: Validate that the number of users present in a room updates in real-time when users join or leave the room.

steps.description: User A creates a room.
User count displays '1' immediately.
User B joins the same room.
User count updates to '2' for both User A and User B.
User B leaves the room.
User count updates back to '1' for User A.

title: File Upload Security with JWT and Password Validation
description: Ensure that file uploads are allowed only for authenticated users with valid JWT and access to the correct password-protected room.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a file without a valid JWT token.
Upload is rejected with an authentication error.
Login and join a password-protected room with a valid JWT.
Attempt to upload files to that room with correct JWT and password.
File uploads succeed.

title: Accessibility Compliance of Core UI Components
description: Verify that all reusable UI components (buttons, inputs, dialogs, toasts, etc.) comply with accessibility standards (keyboard navigation, ARIA roles, color contrast).

steps.description: Navigate through the app using keyboard only.
All interactive components are reachable and operable.
Use a screen reader to access UI content.
Proper ARIA labels and roles are present and announced.
Color contrast for text and interactive elements meets WCAG guidelines.

title: Performance Under Load: Multiple Users Clipboard Sync
description: Evaluate application responsiveness and synchronization accuracy with a high number of concurrent users sharing clipboards in the same room.

steps.description: Simulate at least 50 users joining the same room.
Multiple users share text and files simultaneously.
Clipboard data synchronizes with minimal latency.
UI remains responsive for all participants.

title: Room Code Validation for Format and Uniqueness
description: Confirm that room codes are strictly 4-character alphanumeric strings and duplicate room codes are not created.

steps.description: Attempt to create a room with a code shorter or longer than 4 characters or containing invalid characters.
Room creation is blocked with an appropriate validation error.
Attempt to create a room with a 4-character code already in use.
Room creation is prevented, and user is notified of duplicate code.

title: React Query Cache Consistency on Clipboard Updates
description: Verify that React Query properly caches and updates clipboard data in the UI when server state changes occur during sharing.

steps.description: User shares new clipboard data.
Clipboard data is immediately reflected in the UI from React Query cache update.
User reloads the room page.
React Query refetches and displays current clipboard data correctly.

title: Error Handling for Network Disconnection During Real-time Sharing
description: Test how the application handles temporary network disconnects during WebSocket communication and clipboard sharing.

steps.description: User joins a room and shares clipboard data.
Simulate network disconnection.
Attempt to send new clipboard data during disconnection.
App shows user a network error or reconnecting status.
Restore network connection.
WebSocket reconnects automatically, and clipboard synchronization resumes without data loss.
